author: boudoul
body:
Contents of this PR:

    Update VCal to electron unit for the phase 1 detector using eras (gains and offsets)
    Allow separate values for layer 1
    Lower the cluster threshold for Layer 1
(see full description in the original PR merged in 93X PR #19181 )
Work done by  @jkarancs 
Adding @veszpv  @tsusa
title: Update Vcal Calibration (backport of PR #19181 in 92X)
